Pre-Game Insights: Charlotte will aim to end its five-game road losing streak when the Hornets face Cleveland.
The Cavaliers are 20-4 in conference matchups.
Cleveland ranks sixth in the Eastern Conference with 16.0 fast break points per game led by Donovan Mitchell averaging 3.6.
The Hornets are 6-23 in Eastern Conference play.
Charlotte is fourth in the NBA with 12.8 offensive rebounds per game led by Moussa Diabate averaging 3.1.
The Cavaliers average 16.4 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.7 more made shots on average than the 13.7 per game the Hornets allow.
The Hornets average 14.3 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.0 more made shot on average than the 13.3 per game the Cavaliers give up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This matchup is between the 7-26 Charlotte Hornets and the 30-4 Cleveland Cavaliers.
Others: The Cavaliers are first in the Eastern Conference, while the Hornets are 14th.
The game will take place on Sunday at 6 p.m. EST in Cleveland.
